title: Bloomtastic
name: bloomtastic
description: Certificate Revocation checking using bloom filters
author: James Larisch, Aditya Rao

preferences.name: filterSize
preferences.title: How secure would you like to be?
preferences.description: You can specify the minimum global rank of the websites you'd like to filter. If you choose a higher rank this extension will store more data, but will be more secure.

options.label: Check only the 1000 most popular websites (small)
Check only the 100000 most popular websites (medium)
Check only the 100000000 most popular websites (large)

preferences.name: extraSerials
preferences.title: Add serial numbers to filter
preferences.description: For self-test, add serial numbers to filters. Multiple serial numbers must be separated by commas.

preferences.name: enabled
preferences.title: Enabled
preferences.label: Enable blocking websites based on filter revocation.

preferences.name: debug
preferences.title: Debug
preferences.label: Don't enable this unless you know what you're doing.
